text.section:
"Regular schedule" means the carriage of property or passengers by at least:
One single trip between fixed termini per week, for 4 consecutive weeks; or
Three single trips between fixed termini within a period of 10 days.
If property or passengers are carried by any vehicle as described in subsection (a) of this section, any one of the described trips is a regular schedule.
This section shall be liberally construed.
